author: James Joyce
text: Herbert Hughes is staying with Miss Painter at Crez (?)-sur-Loing—Tel: 19 Crez (?). Athlone—Dublin 11. N. will broadcast on Thursday 8 p.m. Act 1 of ‘Shaun the Post’ opera by Harold White and on Friday at 7.15 talk by Curran. What about my binder M. Nadal? Kind regards to you both. J.J.
